mapper.insert: insert into livingroom (imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, price, saveFileName) values (#{imageIndex}, #{productName}, #{cateEn}, #{cate}, #{price}, #{saveFileName})
mapper.select: select imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price, saveFileName from livingroom order by imageIndex desc
select imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price, saveFileName from livingroom where cateEn=#{cateEn} order by imageIndex desc
select imageIndex, productName, cateEn, cate, to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price, saveFileName from livingroom where imageIndex=#{imageIndex} and cateEn=#{cateEn}
